org.eodisp.core.common
Interface SmCoreService

All Known Implementing Classes:
SmCoreServiceImpl
public interface SmCoreService

The local interface for the core services of the simulation manager application. This interface will primarily be used by the GUI component of this application.

This interface is not exported remotely and can therefore only be used by projects that are linked to this component.

Version:
$Id:$
Author:
eglimi

Method Summary
 void connectToRepos()
          Establishes a connection to the model repository application.
 boolean isReposConnected()
          Tests if a connection to the model repository application is already established.
 

Method Detail

connectToRepos

void connectToRepos()
                    throws java.net.URISyntaxException,
                           java.rmi.AccessException,
                           java.rmi.RemoteException,
                           java.rmi.NotBoundException
Establishes a connection to the model repository application. This application might be locally or remotely available. To which model repository this methods tries to connect can be configured in the configuration files for the simulation manager application.

Throws:
java.net.URISyntaxException - See URISyntaxException for more information about this exception.
java.rmi.AccessException - See AccessException for more information about this exception.
java.rmi.RemoteException - See RemoteException for more information about this exception.
java.rmi.NotBoundException - See NotBoundException for more information about this exception.

isReposConnected

boolean isReposConnected()
Tests if a connection to the model repository application is already established.

Returns:
true, if a connection is established, otherwise false.
